interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 21°C 4 Pieces Detangling Brush and Hair Comb Set Knots Detangler Easy to Clean for Kinky Wavy Curly Coily Wet Dry Oil Thick Long Natural Hair(Pink)
Review Date: 2020/06/20
Store: 21°C
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': '21°C', 'Special Feature': 'Detangling', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Unit Count': '8.3 Ounce', 'Hair Type': 'All, Coarse, Wavy, Dry, Curly, Thick', 'Package Dimensions': '10.3 x 3.4 x 1.7 inches; 8.5 Ounces'}
Review Text: This 4 piece hair set is great! My wife has wavy hair, as well as my daughter, and myself. My son has long, curly, coarse hair. This set works on all of our hair types! The largest hollowed our brush is great for blow drying. The smaller comb/brush is designed to remove tangles from curly hair, and it works well when using with detangling spray. There is a small attachment included, which hooks onto the back of the brush to keep the bristles together. You also get a wide tooth comb and a parting comb. Everything included in the set is lightweight and easy to hold. It’s a great set at an amazing price!
Review Title: The perfect set for your hair!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

My wife has been using this product for about a week and likes it. It’s very easy to apply, just like clear liquid eyeliner. It’s good that it does not irritate my wife’s sensitive skin at all. She has tried on her lashes and has noticed a slight difference in the thickness of them. I am sure that time will bring more dramatic results. The product is a bit pricey for the amount you get though.
Easy to apply, does not irritate.

It smells similar to rubbing alcohol, however it’s not too strong. I love this hand sanitizer as it doesn’t dry out my hands like others. Every family needs a bottle of this in their home!

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user maintains a strong preference for skin care products, focusing on effective solutions like under-eye treatments for puffiness and dark circles. They prioritize practicality and ease of use, favoring items that deliver instant hydration and refreshing sensations. The user appreciates products that enhance sensory experiences, often highlighting the benefits of cooling items like masks. 

Recently, they demonstrated a family-centric approach by sharing positive feedback about a gentle face cleanser their wife enjoys, emphasizing its moisturizing qualities and suitability for sensitive skin. They also value beautifully scented products but are flexible in exploring options that resonate with loved ones, regardless of scent. 

In their latest interaction, the user showcased their commitment to family needs by purchasing a detangling hair brush set suitable for various hair types within their household, underlining their focus on practical solutions for effective grooming. This aligns with their dedication to ensuring the use of functional products that enhance health and well-being for themselves and their family. 

Overall, the user seeks skin care options that blend immediate benefits with sensory pleasure while showing an evolving awareness of natural and cruelty-free ingredients. Their approach underscores the importance of practical, effective routines while remaining dedicated to both personal care and the well-being of their loved ones.
